::KitKat::

She stopped and stared at the wall as the baby communicated it's 
message.  "Temporal rift? Phobia? How could you have known and not 
tell me of this rift that threatens out lives like that?" She heard 
the baby hit the floor.  She looked at it and sighed. "You know 
Phobia, I could really use your advise on this one. I wish I could 
bring you back."  Then her ears perked up at ehat she 
said. "Yeah....yeah. I can bring you back."  She scooped up the baby 
in her hands and ran to the lab.  She went to the replicator and put 
the baby in the tray.  She crossed her fingers as she turned on the 
replicator. "I hope this works. I was originally going to use this 
for Megatron's spark, but, Dang it Phobia. You just had to give me 
more trouble now huh?" She activated the replicator and hoped that it 
would replicate the baby enought o get a good DNA sample.  Then she 
might have a chance to replicate Phobia's body from the sample.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> The baby climbed up the side of the captains chair and onto KitKats
> shoulder. It bit down using KitKats internal circuitry as an 
antenna it sent
> a message.
> 
> In her mind Phobia appeared. His voice echoing thouroughly. "In the 
event of
> my deletion I send this message." The voice was calm and collected 
with an
> honest tone about it."I came to this planet planning to save our 
time. Since
> you're hearing this something drastic must have happened to me." It 
paused
> again trying to collect himself. "Temporal waves from this planet 
cause
> great destruction throughout the universe, it must be stopped or we 
will
> create the biggest Paradox in cybertrons history." with that the 
message
> stopped and the spider fell off and died.
